channel.title: HYDRANS - Hues EP [Chill] (EP) :soundcloud:
channel.description:
HYDRANS - Hues EP *headphones recommended*
My first ever EP made in Auxy! It has 6 songs in it, see the tracklist below. I worked very hard on this album so feedback is greatly appreciated. Which song is your favorite? Which one do you not like so much? Anyway, thank you all so much for listening and look forward to more released soon! <3
Link to full EP: https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/sets/hues-ep
- Tracklist Song 1: oceans - https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/oceans?in=hydrans/sets/hues-ep Song 2: dark - https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/dark?in=hydrans/sets/hues-ep Song 3: hues (title track) - https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/hues?in=hydrans/sets/hues-ep Song 4: streamline - https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/streamline?in=hydrans/sets/hues-ep Song 5: fuzzy - https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/fuzzy?in=hydrans/sets/hues-ep Song 6: burns - https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/burns?in=hydrans/sets/hues-ep
For anyone wondering, the cover art for all the songs and the album cover was done with www.canva.com
Thanks again! :slight_smile: -HYDRANS
